definitions.definition: at any time that; on any occasion that

examples.text: You can ask for help whenever you need it.
Whenever she comes, she brings a friend.
The roof leaks whenever it rains.

definitions.definition: used when the time when something happens is not important

examples.text: ‘When do you need it by?’ ‘Saturday or Sunday. Whenever.’
It's not urgent—we can do it next week or whenever.
